title: Looking For DM Appointment Setter
job_overview:
Virtual Setter (DMs) – Base Salary PLUS Commission | $800+/month

We’re looking for a driven, professional Virtual Setter to join our growing team. Your job? Start conversations in the DMs, qualify leads, and book calls. Simple as that.

Must have DM setting experience where you can talk to a lead without needing a script.

I am looking for someone who can have conversations with leads and book as many calls as possible.

Following up with leads & responding quickly is the biggest part of this job.

What We’re Looking For:

Full-time availability (20-40 hrs/week) - 8am-4pm Pacific Standard Time
Monday-Friday (bonus if you can work Saturdays/Sundays)

Solid English (spoken and written)

Must Have Reliable internet and wifi

Professional presence and work ethic

Hungry, motivated, and ready to earn commissions

Compensation:

Base Pay + Commission

$800+/month potential (and growing)

If you’re someone who’s proactive, coachable, and ready to grow in a high-performance remote team, we want to hear from you.

Apply below with your resume and a short intro video (2 min or less) explaining why you're the right fit.

To prove you read the entire job description make sure to include the word “GROWTH” in all caps along with your resume and intro video

Thanks
